job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pDelta IT is on a journey of transformation We are changing the way we do business from top to bottom As thoughtleaders within Delta we strive to create meaningful and innovative solutions and are looking for team members to help us realize our visionppDelta IT employees are thinkers doers innovatorsppWe are proactiveppWe are collaborativeppWe deliver impact to our customersppJoin us on our transformation journey in becoming a worldclass IT organization at the worlds best airlineppbrppstrongOverview of ResponsibilitiesstrongppAs a Software Engineer on the Enterprise Notification Systems team youll create enhance and support an ecosystem of applications that powers millions of Delta customer interactions each day This position will contribute technical expertise to design and develop business application data and infrastructure solutions seek opportunities to optimize performance maintain and troubleshoot application components as required quickly resolve problems and provide timely followup The individual is a subject matter expert in integration of applications used for customer interactionspulliDesign develop and implement applications features and enhancements in support of Notifications Virtual Assist Messaging Social and other customer interaction channels with an emphasis on optimized supportable and welldocumented of the customers business to recommend solutions and ensure business and technology objectives are met and maintainedliliContribute to technical initiatives and projects requiring integration of crossfunctional systems provide technical guidance in evaluating applications and systemsliliUnderstand user and process requirements and ensure those requirements can be achieved through highquality
